parameters.name: BackupId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup set.

parameters.name: BackupRegion
parameters.description:
The region where the cross-region data backup file of the instance is stored.

> This parameter is valid only for PolarDB for MySQL clusters.

parameters.name: BackupStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the backup set. Valid values:

*   **Success**
*   **Failed**

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ` format. The time must be in UTC. The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. The value must be a positive integer that does not exceed the maximum value of the INTEGER data type. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ` format. The time must be in UTC.
